text: Josep Fornas Martínez (19 October 1924 - 4 January 2021) was a Spanish politician, businessman and editor. He was born in Barcelona. Fornas was a member of the Democratic Union of Catalonia and Republican Left of Catalonia. He was a member of the Parliament of Catalonia from 1980 to 1984. Fornas died on 4 January 2021 in Barcelona, aged 96.Muere a los 96 años Josep Fornas, histórico de ERC y colaborador de Tarradellas ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Editors Category:Politicians from Barcelona
title: Josep Fornas
